articles.title: Prostate cancer hopes raised after at-home spit test trials - BBC.com
articles.description: Research suggests cheap and simple spit tests may be better at catching the disease than blood tests.
articles.content:
Saliva tests carried out at home are better at identifying men who are at higher risk of prostate cancer than the standard blood test, new research suggests.
The at-home test could identify genetic … [+2922 chars]
